title: Game-Based Blended Learning Course for Understanding Salt Chemistry

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Case-based design to strengthen workplace relevance for professional practitioners.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the ionization process of salt compounds with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can present five or more examples of salt applications in daily life and industrial settings.
Learners can apply chemical terminology with 90% accuracy in a digital card game environment.
Learners can represent analyzed experimental data on salt in graphical form.

resources: Digital Game Platform (e.g., Customized Kahoot! Version)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
